page.title: 10EDUCATION STRACATHRO
page.content: My name is Sean Burke. I like coming to school because it is not a big school and there are a lot of games to play including computer games We have a list so that everyone has the same chance at the computers. We get lots of visitors. Mr Smith gives us Art on Mondays. Mrs Smith comes on Tuesday for P.E. and Mr Taylor is the vicar. We also have Police Videos to instruct us in Road Safety. The best thing about school, however are the dinners. My favourites are Macaroni, Pizza and Spaghetti .... oh, and milk pudding. I come from Lichfield and my dad is a Marine Commando at Condor Base near Arbroath.
